Seqal 0.1.2 Documentation¶

Welcome to Seqal, a distributed short read mapping and duplicate removal tool. Seqal implements a distributed version of the BWA aligner, and adds a duplicate read removal feature using the same criteria as the Picard MarkDuplicates command.

If you’re just getting started, please read the installation section, then check the usage section for instructions on using Seqal.
